mob6606_3@sundhaven.description: A smoke-colored rat sits in the shadows.

mob6663_2@sundhaven.name: mob6663_2
mob6663_2@sundhaven.examine:
The moth, pale downy white in color, beats its wings heavily
above some ferns nearby. It seems quite harmless.
mob6663_2@sundhaven.description: A small moth flits about nearby.

mob6654@sundhaven.name: mob6654
mob6654@sundhaven.examine:
Milady de Winter is a slender form draped in white ermine and knowledgeable 
in the ways of enchantment.  Golden hair falls to her waist, her eyes are 
cyan blue and widened with anger, or perhaps a tinge of fear.  Long 
presumed dead, she wears one of many guises and is accustomed to discarding 
lives.  Watch out, this woman could put you in a trance at any moment!
mob6654@sundhaven.description: A beautiful woman with fair hair flares angrily up at your intrusion.

mob6646_3@sundhaven.name: mob6646_3
mob6646_3@sundhaven.examine:
He seems vaguely interested in something beyond the range of your five
senses, as cats often are.
mob6646_3@sundhaven.description: A grey cat pads around, sniffing things.

mob6608_1@sundhaven.name: mob6608_1
mob6608_1@sundhaven.examine:
She is garbed in a peasant's frock and carries a basket of blackberries.
Black hair frames a gentle face and broad grey eyes accustomed to hardship.
She gives you a shy smile and feigns interest in a fray of her sleeve.
mob6608_1@sundhaven.description: A blackberry picker is singing among the bushes.

mob6661@sundhaven.name: mob6661
mob6661@sundhaven.examine:
His blank eyes, the color long lost, leave the broad sky and seem
to stare right through you. His sanity, also long lost, might have
made him a fine fellow once, but he would best be left alone now.
mob6661@sundhaven.description: A blind mage is sitting here, communing with nature.

mob6665_3@sundhaven.name: mob6665_3
mob6665_3@sundhaven.examine:
The noble is tall, of fair hair and complexion, and dressed in
gold-bordered finery. He appears unaware of your presence,
and preoccupied with his own affairs.
mob6665_3@sundhaven.description: A Sundhaven noble stares past you with an aloof air.

mob6662_4@sundhaven.name: mob6662_4
mob6662_4@sundhaven.examine:
A giant leechlike movement under the water marks the outline
of a lamprey, skin wet and oil-black. The row of teeth that
gapes for an instant above the waterline gives a hint of its
hunger for prey in this deserted place.
mob6662_4@sundhaven.description: Something makes an eel-like motion under the water.

mob6601_2@sundhaven.name: mob6601_2
mob6601_2@sundhaven.examine:
His swarthy human face is framed by well-combed dark hair that gazes
about with a relaxed, alert air. He wears in his uniform the dark gold
and black colors of the town banner, and the sword that hangs from
his hip looks more than idle decoration.
mob6601_2@sundhaven.description: A guard of Sundhaven stands watchfully.

mob6659_5@sundhaven.name: mob6659_5
mob6659_5@sundhaven.examine:
A handsome, stalwart warrior of the famed elite guard of Sundhaven
keeps a tireless watch over the peace of the town.
mob6659_5@sundhaven.description: A warrior of the Black Watch maintains a alert vigilance here.
mob6659_5@sundhaven.pname: a warrior of the Black Watch

mob6638_1@sundhaven.name: mob6638_1
mob6638_1@sundhaven.examine:
His small, darting eyes are set off by a mess of tousled black hair.
Ever since his sling shot was taken away, he has been playing with 
torches.
mob6638_1@sundhaven.description: A mischievious boy is looking for something to set on fire.

mob6631@sundhaven.name: mob6631
mob6631@sundhaven.examine:
This young, dark woman has traveled far from jungle lands to prepare
her spicy-hot dishes for this heavily traversed town. She sings a 
foreign song in a bizarre, guttaral tongue.
mob6631@sundhaven.description: Mekala tosses some pad tai in a pan nearby.

mob6601_7@sundhaven.name: mob6601_7
mob6601_7@sundhaven.examine:
His swarthy human face is framed by well-combed dark hair that gazes
about with a relaxed, alert air. He wears in his uniform the dark gold
and black colors of the town banner, and the sword that hangs from
his hip looks more than idle decoration.
mob6601_7@sundhaven.description: A guard of Sundhaven stands watchfully.

mob6659_3@sundhaven.name: mob6659_3
mob6659_3@sundhaven.examine:
A handsome, stalwart warrior of the famed elite guard of Sundhaven
keeps a tireless watch over the peace of the town.
mob6659_3@sundhaven.description: A warrior of the Black Watch maintains a alert vigilance here.
mob6659_3@sundhaven.pname: a warrior of the Black Watch

mob6652@sundhaven.name: mob6652
mob6652@sundhaven.examine:
The kestrel's plumage is pale as lamb's down, making it a beautiful
animal, but the sharp curved beak and arched talons remind you
of its predatory habits. A tiny metal ring is clasped round one
leg.. it must be someone's pet.
mob6652@sundhaven.description: A giant white kestrel is perched near its master.

mob6614_3@sundhaven.name: mob6614_3
mob6614_3@sundhaven.examine:
She is clad in the brightest colors; red, gold, purple and orange compete
for the attention of the eye. She has thrown down her feathered cap
and seems ready for donations.
mob6614_3@sundhaven.description: A gypsy minstrel bows a fiddle nearby.

mob6641@sundhaven.name: mob6641
mob6641@sundhaven.examine:
His white beard trails down to his withered toes. His forehead is creased
in contemplation, but a wine-induced smile plays on his lips. Maybe you
could beat him at a game of chess?
mob6641@sundhaven.description: An old mage studies the chessboard in rapt contemplation.

mob6623@sundhaven.name: mob6623
mob6623@sundhaven.examine:
Thin and wisp-haired, this old man regards you with a wily grin and
looks ready to cut some deals. There is a rumour he was kicked out of
the mages guild for fraud. Can you trust his goods?
mob6623@sundhaven.description: The cartographer grins at you over wire-rimmed spectacles.

mob6617@sundhaven.name: mob6617
mob6617@sundhaven.examine:
You see but a blur in the shadow that is the keeper of the Black Naga
assassins guild. She is willing to train newcomers to her roguish trade,
after that you must search elsewhere for learnings.
mob6617@sundhaven.description: The Mistress of Assassins comes half out of the shadow.

mob6620@sundhaven.name: mob6620
mob6620@sundhaven.examine:
This plump fellow leads a quiet life. Nevertheless the odd creatures
that find their way to this bar from all lands have had an effect on
him. He glances up and gives you a lopsided grin as he mumbles to the
floor.
mob6620@sundhaven.description: The bartender is here doing his thing.

mob6601_6@sundhaven.name: mob6601_6
mob6601_6@sundhaven.examine:
His swarthy human face is framed by well-combed dark hair that gazes
about with a relaxed, alert air. He wears in his uniform the dark gold
and black colors of the town banner, and the sword that hangs from
his hip looks more than idle decoration.
mob6601_6@sundhaven.description: A guard of Sundhaven stands watchfully.

mob6618@sundhaven.name: mob6618
mob6618@sundhaven.examine:
A swarthy man clad in the padded armor standard for training newcomers.
Thick auburn hair and beard frame a face intelligent in battle.
mob6618@sundhaven.description: The Knightmaster fingers his beard and ponders you.

mob6664@sundhaven.name: mob6664
mob6664@sundhaven.examine:
The grey and strained eyes of the courier look at you with ill-concealed
lack of interest. The scars on his face are an indication that he has
seen foul weather of all sorts on the roads, and nothing you could
request would surprise him.
mob6664@sundhaven.description: A disgruntled courier awaits your bidding.

mob6659_2@sundhaven.name: mob6659_2
mob6659_2@sundhaven.examine:
A handsome, stalwart warrior of the famed elite guard of Sundhaven
keeps a tireless watch over the peace of the town.
mob6659_2@sundhaven.description: A warrior of the Black Watch maintains a alert vigilance here.
mob6659_2@sundhaven.pname: a warrior of the Black Watch

mob6606_4@sundhaven.examine: It slinks quickly from your vision, apparently nervous about eye contact.
mob6606_4@sundhaven.description: A smoke-colored rat sits in the shadows.

mob6614_2@sundhaven.name: mob6614_2
mob6614_2@sundhaven.examine:
She is clad in the brightest colors; red, gold, purple and orange compete
for the attention of the eye. She has thrown down her feathered cap
and seems ready for donations.
mob6614_2@sundhaven.description: A gypsy minstrel bows a fiddle nearby.

mob6632@sundhaven.name: mob6632
mob6632@sundhaven.examine:
The cousin of the warrior guildmaster is six foot five and perhaps
three hundred pounds.. needless to say, he has many friends. He
stands rose-buffing a beautiful suit of scale mail.
mob6632@sundhaven.description: The armourer is here buffing a suit of scale mail.

mob6662_3@sundhaven.name: mob6662_3
mob6662_3@sundhaven.examine:
A giant leechlike movement under the water marks the outline
of a lamprey, skin wet and oil-black. The row of teeth that
gapes for an instant above the waterline gives a hint of its
hunger for prey in this deserted place.
mob6662_3@sundhaven.description: Something makes an eel-like motion under the water.

mob6638@sundhaven.name: mob6638
mob6638@sundhaven.examine:
His small, darting eyes are set off by a mess of tousled black hair.
Ever since his sling shot was taken away, he has been playing with 
torches.
mob6638@sundhaven.description: A mischievious boy is looking for something to set on fire.

mob6639_3@sundhaven.name: mob6639_3
mob6639_3@sundhaven.examine:
This small girl has a fine dress and precocious look that makes you
feel she must be a wealthy citizen's daughter, perhaps a merchant
or judge.
mob6639_3@sundhaven.description: A dark-haired girl is eyeing you curiously.

mob6606_2@sundhaven.name: mob6606_2
mob6606_2@sundhaven.examine: It slinks quickly from your vision, apparently nervous about eye contact.
mob6606_2@sundhaven.description: A smoke-colored rat sits in the shadows.

mob6650@sundhaven.name: mob6650
mob6650@sundhaven.examine:
The tiny metal clasp round a leg of this diminuitive bird tells you
it is someone's pet. It regards you with one eye then the other in
a nervous fashion, awaiting its first chance to fly to freedom.
mob6650@sundhaven.description: A little sparrow pecks at the ground.

mob6642@sundhaven.name: mob6642
mob6642@sundhaven.examine:
This brawny fellow hops about, rather gracelessly, shadow-boxing.
He is too absorbed to notice you watching him.
mob6642@sundhaven.description: A young warrior is sparring with his shadow.

mob6639_2@sundhaven.name: mob6639_2
mob6639_2@sundhaven.examine:
This small girl has a fine dress and precocious look that makes you
feel she must be a wealthy citizen's daughter, perhaps a merchant
or judge.
mob6639_2@sundhaven.description: A dark-haired girl is eyeing you curiously.

mob6614_1@sundhaven.examine:
She is clad in the brightest colors; red, gold, purple and orange compete

mob6614_1@sundhaven.description: A gypsy minstrel bows a fiddle nearby.

mob6653@sundhaven.name: mob6653
mob6653@sundhaven.examine:
Athos wears a face of sorrow on his noble countenance, displaying
only a few quiet words of philosophy when his tongue is loosened
by drink. His dress depicts a man of learning and his voice one
of some foul experience. Something - or someone - still haunts
him to this day.
mob6653@sundhaven.description: Athos the great knight is somberly nursing a bottle of wine.

mob6606_5@sundhaven.name: mob6606_5
mob6606_5@sundhaven.examine: It slinks quickly from your vision, apparently nervous about eye contact.
mob6606_5@sundhaven.description: A smoke-colored rat sits in the shadows.

mob6601_3@sundhaven.name: mob6601_3
mob6601_3@sundhaven.examine:
His swarthy human face is framed by well-combed dark hair that gazes
about with a relaxed, alert air. He wears in his uniform the dark gold
and black colors of the town banner, and the sword that hangs from
his hip looks more than idle decoration.
mob6601_3@sundhaven.description: A guard of Sundhaven stands watchfully.

mob6662_6@sundhaven.name: mob6662_6
mob6662_6@sundhaven.examine:
A giant leechlike movement under the water marks the outline

mob6662_6@sundhaven.description: Something makes an eel-like motion under the water.

mob6609_2@sundhaven.name: mob6609_2
mob6609_2@sundhaven.examine:
A short, slender being with wary and mirthful eyes barely gives
your kneecaps a second glance. He seems engaged in drawing the 
eyes of persons of wealth. He wears a tray of spices and other 
goods on a strap around his neck.
mob6609_2@sundhaven.description: A halfling peddler is here calling his wares.

mob6626@sundhaven.name: mob6626
mob6626@sundhaven.examine:
The jeweller is a dark-skinned woman in a silken frock. She seems
to be doing very well for herself. A black gem sparkles dimly round
her neck.
mob6626@sundhaven.description: The jeweller stands behind a glass case of rubies.

mob6628@sundhaven.name: mob6628
mob6628@sundhaven.examine:
A round, short fellow covered in flour. He looks content as a
mouse in a corn shed, snacking on his sticky creations perpetually.
mob6628@sundhaven.description: The hobbit pastry chef rolls some dough behind the counter.

brandy@sundhaven.name: Brandy
brandy@sundhaven.examine:
She is garbed in a peasant's frock and carries a basket of blackberries.
Brandy apparently is in charge of all the pickers, and delivers the 
berries to market.  Unfortunately their income isn't enough to modernize.
She remains cheerful despite her mule being stolen recently.
brandy@sundhaven.description: Brandy is here, picking blackberries and humming a tune.

mob6633@sundhaven.name: mob6633
mob6633@sundhaven.examine:
He's a wiry little fellow, but agile as a squirrel. He prefers
to be left alone in the world of blade artistry, and generally
people grant him his wish with pleasure.
mob6633@sundhaven.description: The weaponsmaster sharpens a kris at the back wall.

mob6659_1@sundhaven.name: mob6659_1
mob6659_1@sundhaven.examine:
A handsome, stalwart warrior of the famed elite guard of Sundhaven
keeps a tireless watch over the peace of the town.
mob6659_1@sundhaven.description: A warrior of the Black Watch maintains a alert vigilance here.
mob6659_1@sundhaven.pname: a warrior of the Black Watch

mob6636@sundhaven.name: mob6636
mob6636@sundhaven.examine:
His bug eyes and electric hair show you he has perhaps seen too many
beasts, and they were too much for him.
mob6636@sundhaven.description: A paranoid adventurer hides within the town walls, afraid to leave.

mob6665_1@sundhaven.name: mob6665_1
mob6665_1@sundhaven.examine:
The noble is tall, of fair hair and complexion, and dressed in
gold-bordered finery. He appears unaware of your presence,
and preoccupied with his own affairs.
mob6665_1@sundhaven.description: A Sundhaven noble stares past you with an aloof air.

mob6662_8@sundhaven.name: mob6662_8
mob6662_8@sundhaven.examine:
A giant leechlike movement under the water marks the outline

mob6662_8@sundhaven.description: Something makes an eel-like motion under the water.

mob6646@sundhaven.name: mob6646
mob6646@sundhaven.examine:
He seems vaguely interested in something beyond the range of your five
senses, as cats often are.
mob6646@sundhaven.description: A grey cat pads around, sniffing things.

mob6603@sundhaven.name: mob6603
mob6603@sundhaven.examine:
The glow of candles half reveals a shadowy priest with dark
features and a somber but pleasant manner.  He carries a small
kaleidoscope in one hand, with which he watches the movements of
his elusive deity.
mob6603@sundhaven.description: A black-robed priest is here, tending a candelabra.

mob6605_1@sundhaven.name: mob6605_1
mob6605_1@sundhaven.examine:
Regarded in local myth as a bird of prophecy, it regards you with one
eye as it passes over.
mob6605_1@sundhaven.description: A shadow passes along the ground something flies overhead.

mob6614_4@sundhaven.description: A gypsy minstrel bows a fiddle nearby.

mob6629@sundhaven.name: mob6629
mob6629@sundhaven.examine:
He is withered as a gnarled tree, but seems wise in a mad sort of way.
Glass vials of all colors surround him, attesting to his knowledge.
mob6629@sundhaven.description: The old alchemist stands here preparing bubbling vials.

mob6609@sundhaven.name: mob6609
mob6609@sundhaven.examine:
A short, slender being with wary and mirthful eyes barely gives

mob6609@sundhaven.description: A halfling peddler is here calling his wares.

mob6646_1@sundhaven.examine:
He seems vaguely interested in something beyond the range of your five

mob6646_1@sundhaven.description: A grey cat pads around, sniffing things.

mob6658@sundhaven.name: mob6658
mob6658@sundhaven.examine:
This is the familiar of the Archmage of the town, at present an ill-
meaning sort of ruler.  It is charged with the worthy task of defending
the guild from unwelcome intruders.  Its wickedly curving horns and
innocuous teeth attest to its ability to.... well, dispose of you.
mob6658@sundhaven.description: A horned imp is crouched nearby, unfolding its wings.

mob6635@sundhaven.name: mob6635
mob6635@sundhaven.examine:
She cocks her head from side to side, studying you rapidly, then
does an impression that looks very familiar and makes your friends
crack up laughing.
mob6635@sundhaven.description: A grey and white mockingbird mimics you from an oak branch.

mob6659@sundhaven.name: mob6659
mob6659@sundhaven.examine:
A handsome, stalwart warrior of the famed elite guard of Sundhaven
keeps a tireless watch over the peace of the town.
mob6659@sundhaven.description: A warrior of the Black Watch maintains a alert vigilance here.
mob6659@sundhaven.pname: a warrior of the Black Watch

His swarthy human face is framed by well-combed dark hair that gazes

mob6601_10@sundhaven.description: A guard of Sundhaven stands watchfully.

mob6621@sundhaven.name: mob6621
mob6621@sundhaven.examine:
Having retired from the bounty lists, this thief spends his days
managing the Nightbreak Cafe for the assassins guild. So may you,
if you become addicted enough to caffeine.
mob6621@sundhaven.description: A retired thief cleans a shot glass behind the counter.

mob6655@sundhaven.name: mob6655
mob6655@sundhaven.examine:
The guardian naga is a serpentlike creature, coal-black scales
shield an elongate body with the head of a woman, and make no sound
with her curious writhing. It looks intelligent enough to judge
whether you are worthy to pass into the guild of rogues that is
its keeping.
mob6655@sundhaven.description: The black naga guardian is coiled here.

mob6611@sundhaven.name: mob6611
mob6611@sundhaven.examine:
His shining armor and sword of silver are so stainless that you wonder
if he merely has a master blacksmith, or an overactive imagination.
mob6611@sundhaven.description: A knight in bright armor is telling tales in a roaring voice.

mob6662_2@sundhaven.name: mob6662_2
mob6662_2@sundhaven.examine:
A giant leechlike movement under the water marks the outline
of a lamprey, skin wet and oil-black. The row of teeth that
gapes for an instant above the waterline gives a hint of its
hunger for prey in this deserted place.
mob6662_2@sundhaven.description: Something makes an eel-like motion under the water.

mob6647_1@sundhaven.name: mob6647_1
mob6647_1@sundhaven.examine:
He's a beautiful creature, with a long snow-colored coat tinged with
gold in the sunlight. His eyes are closed as he lies in bliss in the
heat.
mob6647_1@sundhaven.description: A large white cat is sunning himself on a wall.

mob6639_1@sundhaven.name: mob6639_1
mob6639_1@sundhaven.examine:
This small girl has a fine dress and precocious look that makes you

or judge.
mob6639_1@sundhaven.description: A dark-haired girl is eyeing you curiously.

mob6606_7@sundhaven.examine: It slinks quickly from your vision, apparently nervous about eye contact.
mob6606_7@sundhaven.description: A smoke-colored rat sits in the shadows.

mob6649_1@sundhaven.name: mob6649_1
mob6649_1@sundhaven.examine:
He was apparently chosen for his inability to blink. He is a brawny
fellow, but doesnt strike you as having the froth-mouthed drive to fight
as seen in the town guards.
mob6649_1@sundhaven.description: The gate watchman stares glass-eyed at the horizon.

mob6665_2@sundhaven.name: mob6665_2
mob6665_2@sundhaven.examine:
The noble is tall, of fair hair and complexion, and dressed in
gold-bordered finery. He appears unaware of your presence,
and preoccupied with his own affairs.
mob6665_2@sundhaven.description: A Sundhaven noble stares past you with an aloof air.

mob6645@sundhaven.name: mob6645
mob6645@sundhaven.examine:
Some black animal, its hard to tell exactly what in this darkness, is
chained to the back wall. Even its eyes are darkened as a black fold
of cloth covers them until the moment of its departure from the world.
mob6645@sundhaven.description: An iron chain rattles as something moves in the back of the room.

mob6613@sundhaven.name: mob6613
mob6613@sundhaven.examine:
She has a beauty that fascinates the eye, but she shows about as much
interest in you as an empty keg.
mob6613@sundhaven.description: A foreign princess is downing shots at the bar.

mob6627@sundhaven.name: mob6627
mob6627@sundhaven.examine:
This local witch comes from desert lands and is making her fortune
off the superstitious. Her dark eyes look sharply into yours in the
mirror on the far wall. Her black hair and turban remind you of her
exotic origins.
mob6627@sundhaven.description: Phadela is here grinning maniacally in a mirror.

mob6608_2@sundhaven.name: mob6608_2
mob6608_2@sundhaven.examine:
She is garbed in a peasant's frock and carries a basket of blackberries.
Black hair frames a gentle face and broad grey eyes accustomed to hardship.
She gives you a shy smile and feigns interest in a fray of her sleeve.
mob6608_2@sundhaven.description: A blackberry picker is singing among the bushes.

mob6619@sundhaven.name: mob6619
mob6619@sundhaven.examine:
His violet robes have long frayed and faded, his beard is long and tapering,
but his powers have only grown throughout the years. He is willing to 
teach his mystical arts to newcomers.
mob6619@sundhaven.description: The Archmage watches you through a crystal ball as you arrive.

mob6662@sundhaven.name: mob6662
mob6662@sundhaven.examine:
A giant leechlike movement under the water marks the outline
of a lamprey, skin wet and oil-black. The row of teeth that
gapes for an instant above the waterline gives a hint of its
hunger for prey in this deserted place.
mob6662@sundhaven.description: Something makes an eel-like motion under the water.

mob6616@sundhaven.name: mob6616
mob6616@sundhaven.examine:
She is tall, elderly and imposing, but willing to teach those new to
her priestly arts. The black gown that she wears flows past her toes 
to the stone floor.
mob6616@sundhaven.description: The Priestess of the Ministry is here, garbed in black.

mob6601_8@sundhaven.name: mob6601_8
mob6601_8@sundhaven.examine:
His swarthy human face is framed by well-combed dark hair that gazes

his hip looks more than idle decoration.
mob6601_8@sundhaven.description: A guard of Sundhaven stands watchfully.

mob6604@sundhaven.name: mob6604
mob6604@sundhaven.examine:
She looks entirely focused on her task of painting and numbering,
yet pauses to give you a nod as you pass in. Her beauty, though
great, is surpassed by the swirl of etherous colors that she busies 
herself with.
mob6604@sundhaven.description: A black-robed priestess is charting a stellar calendar on the wall.

mob6622@sundhaven.name: mob6622
mob6622@sundhaven.examine:
His tall, noble bearing seems to go hand in hand with the alert
postures of his taloned birds. A magnificent white kestrel stares
at you from his left shoulder.
mob6622@sundhaven.description: The falconer stands proudly before several cages.

mob6635_1@sundhaven.name: mob6635_1
mob6635_1@sundhaven.examine:

mob6639@sundhaven.description: A dark-haired girl is eyeing you curiously.

mob6644@sundhaven.name: mob6644
mob6644@sundhaven.examine:
She is busy anointing a serrated dagger with a special balm, and
sprinkling a dark water over the animal. She asks that you take a 
seat and keep quiet.
mob6644@sundhaven.description: A priestess is preparing a blindfolded animal for sacrifice.

mob6624@sundhaven.name: mob6624
mob6624@sundhaven.examine: This little man has found his bliss.
mob6624@sundhaven.description: The town treasurer sits happily on a huge pile of gold.

mob6639_5@sundhaven.name: mob6639_5
mob6639_5@sundhaven.examine:
This small girl has a fine dress and precocious look that makes you

mob6639_5@sundhaven.description: A dark-haired girl is eyeing you curiously.

mob6601_4@sundhaven.description: A guard of Sundhaven stands watchfully.

mob6643@sundhaven.name: mob6643
mob6643@sundhaven.examine:
He doesn't look too nervous about being found and brutally hung for
his crimes. With his feet up and margarita in hand, he kicks back in
an easy chair and thumbs through a magazine.
mob6643@sundhaven.description: A thief is lounging, hiding out from the bounty hunters.

mob6601_1@sundhaven.name: mob6601_1
mob6601_1@sundhaven.examine:
His swarthy human face is framed by well-combed dark hair that gazes
about with a relaxed, alert air. He wears in his uniform the dark gold
and black colors of the town banner, and the sword that hangs from
his hip looks more than idle decoration.
mob6601_1@sundhaven.description: A guard of Sundhaven stands watchfully.

mob6637@sundhaven.name: mob6637
mob6637@sundhaven.examine:
The fact that he has been about many lands shows on his weathered, scarred
face. When he notes you looking him over he smiles cunningly and shows
you a variety of colored silk goods.
mob6637@sundhaven.description: A silk trader is strolling, looking for business.

mob6647@sundhaven.name: mob6647
mob6647@sundhaven.examine:
He's a beautiful creature, with a long snow-colored coat tinged with
gold in the sunlight. His eyes are closed as he lies in bliss in the
heat.
mob6647@sundhaven.description: A large white cat is sunning himself on a wall.

mob6600@sundhaven.name: mob6600
mob6600@sundhaven.examine:
A tall noble with sand-colored hair and goatee is strolling by with 
an amiable but authoritave countenance. Long out of knighthood, he 
nevertheless looks quite confident in his abilities to defend himself, 
and has gone on to wining, dining and governing the human population.
mob6600@sundhaven.description: The Earl of Sundhaven is out for a stroll.

mob6640@sundhaven.name: mob6640
mob6640@sundhaven.examine:
She looks plump from plenty of good eating. Her wide green eyes are 
fixated on a fluttering mockingbird, the stripes of her thick black 
and brown fur mingling with the lines of the grasses.
mob6640@sundhaven.description: A tabby cat is stalking a mockingbird.

mob6610@sundhaven.name: mob6610
mob6610@sundhaven.examine:
You are absorbed by the foul smell of his ragged body, but take
pity; there are worse odors among the wild regions of the vast world.
mob6610@sundhaven.description: A mendicant in rags shoves a cup in your face.

mob6656@sundhaven.name: mob6656
mob6656@sundhaven.examine:
It's a brawny beast, measuring six feet at the shoulder, and staring
passively at you with cold red eyes. It watches faithfully over the
guild of physical battle that is its charge; only those worthy may
enter.
mob6656@sundhaven.description: A large guardian gryphon sits immobile before you.

mob6649_3@sundhaven.name: mob6649_3
mob6649_3@sundhaven.examine:
He was apparently chosen for his inability to blink. He is a brawny
fellow, but doesnt strike you as having the froth-mouthed drive to fight
as seen in the town guards.
mob6649_3@sundhaven.description: The gate watchman stares glass-eyed at the horizon.

mob6663@sundhaven.name: mob6663
mob6663@sundhaven.examine:
The moth, pale downy white in color, beats its wings heavily
above some ferns nearby. It seems quite harmless.
mob6663@sundhaven.description: A small moth flits about nearby.

mob6605_2@sundhaven.name: mob6605_2
mob6605_2@sundhaven.examine:
Regarded in local myth as a bird of prophecy, it regards you with one
eye as it passes over.
mob6605_2@sundhaven.description: A shadow passes along the ground something flies overhead.

mob6607@sundhaven.name: mob6607
mob6607@sundhaven.examine:
Catching you spotting him, he gives you a quick grin and a friendly nudge.
Better check your pockets.

mob6610_2@sundhaven.name: mob6610_2
mob6610_2@sundhaven.examine:
You are absorbed by the foul smell of his ragged body, but take
pity; there are worse odors among the wild regions of the vast world.
mob6610_2@sundhaven.description: A mendicant in rags shoves a cup in your face.

mob6657@sundhaven.name: mob6657
mob6657@sundhaven.examine:
The guardian stands motionless with eyes of stone fixed on the far
wall. Nonetheless, this reptile, a figure born of a cold wisdom,
knows well enough if you are worthy to pass into the guild of
priests.
mob6657@sundhaven.description: A basilisk summoned from the ether guards a doorway.

mob6630@sundhaven.name: mob6630
mob6630@sundhaven.examine:
An old silver haired woman levitates and sings to herself as she reshelves
tomes and organizes scrolls and parchments.
mob6630@sundhaven.description: The wise magess flies about the shop.

mob6651@sundhaven.name: mob6651
mob6651@sundhaven.examine:
The blackbird sports glossy dark feathers with wings tipped in crimson,
and a keen eye. The small metal clasp round one leg tells you it is 
someone's trained pet.
mob6651@sundhaven.description: A red-winged blackbird is preening nearby.

mob6615@sundhaven.name: mob6615
mob6615@sundhaven.examine:
He notices you checking him out, bounces up into your face, and begins
reciting bad poetry. He looks suspiciously like someone you know.
mob6615@sundhaven.description: The village idiot is dancing about.

mob6649@sundhaven.name: mob6649
mob6649@sundhaven.examine:
He was apparently chosen for his inability to blink. He is a brawny
fellow, but doesnt strike you as having the froth-mouthed drive to fight
as seen in the town guards.
mob6649@sundhaven.description: The gate watchman stares glass-eyed at the horizon.

mob6662_1@sundhaven.name: mob6662_1
mob6662_1@sundhaven.examine:
A giant leechlike movement under the water marks the outline
of a lamprey, skin wet and oil-black. The row of teeth that
gapes for an instant above the waterline gives a hint of its
hunger for prey in this deserted place.
mob6662_1@sundhaven.description: Something makes an eel-like motion under the water.

mob6609_1@sundhaven.name: mob6609_1
mob6609_1@sundhaven.examine:
A short, slender being with wary and mirthful eyes barely gives
your kneecaps a second glance. He seems engaged in drawing the 
eyes of persons of wealth. He wears a tray of spices and other 
goods on a strap around his neck.
mob6609_1@sundhaven.description: A halfling peddler is here calling his wares.

mob6646_2@sundhaven.name: mob6646_2
mob6646_2@sundhaven.examine:
He seems vaguely interested in something beyond the range of your five
senses, as cats often are.
mob6646_2@sundhaven.description: A grey cat pads around, sniffing things.

mob6660@sundhaven.name: mob6660
mob6660@sundhaven.examine:
The captain of the Black Watch, the well-known anti-rogue force
of Sundhaven, seems a fairly complacent noble confident in his
own strength. He surveys his surroundings casually over the rim
of a glass of strong drink.
mob6660@sundhaven.description: The Lord of the Black Watch keeps the peace as he sips a scotch.
mob6660@sundhaven.pname: the Lord of the Black Watch

mob6666@sundhaven.name: mob6666
mob6666@sundhaven.examine: Achhh! Dont pay too much attention to him or you'll regret it.
mob6666@sundhaven.description: Stu the Recruit is standing here.

mob6602@sundhaven.name: mob6602
mob6602@sundhaven.examine:
This brawny, placid fellow is garbed in loose black garments and an
eyepatch, from his days as a pirate along the northern coast. He has,
of course, since seen the light and sticks to legal murder.
mob6602@sundhaven.description: The town hangman is here, idly swinging a noose.

mob6649_2@sundhaven.name: mob6649_2
mob6649_2@sundhaven.examine:
He was apparently chosen for his inability to blink. He is a brawny
fellow, but doesnt strike you as having the froth-mouthed drive to fight
as seen in the town guards.
mob6649_2@sundhaven.description: The gate watchman stares glass-eyed at the horizon.

mob6659_4@sundhaven.name: mob6659_4
mob6659_4@sundhaven.examine:
A handsome, stalwart warrior of the famed elite guard of Sundhaven
keeps a tireless watch over the peace of the town.
mob6659_4@sundhaven.description: A warrior of the Black Watch maintains a alert vigilance here.
mob6659_4@sundhaven.pname: a warrior of the Black Watch

mob6663_1@sundhaven.name: mob6663_1
mob6663_1@sundhaven.examine:
The moth, pale downy white in color, beats its wings heavily
above some ferns nearby. It seems quite harmless.
mob6663_1@sundhaven.description: A small moth flits about nearby.

mob6665@sundhaven.name: mob6665
mob6665@sundhaven.examine:
The noble is tall, of fair hair and complexion, and dressed in
gold-bordered finery. He appears unaware of your presence,
and preoccupied with his own affairs.
mob6665@sundhaven.description: A Sundhaven noble stares past you with an aloof air.

mob6662_5@sundhaven.name: mob6662_5
mob6662_5@sundhaven.examine:
A giant leechlike movement under the water marks the outline
of a lamprey, skin wet and oil-black. The row of teeth that
gapes for an instant above the waterline gives a hint of its
hunger for prey in this deserted place.
mob6662_5@sundhaven.description: Something makes an eel-like motion under the water.

mob6606@sundhaven.name: mob6606
mob6606@sundhaven.examine: It slinks quickly from your vision, apparently nervous about eye contact.
mob6606@sundhaven.description: A smoke-colored rat sits in the shadows.

mob6606_6@sundhaven.name: mob6606_6
mob6606_6@sundhaven.examine: It slinks quickly from your vision, apparently nervous about eye contact.
mob6606_6@sundhaven.description: A smoke-colored rat sits in the shadows.

mob6625@sundhaven.name: mob6625
mob6625@sundhaven.examine:
This ex-warrior is short and brawny, looks to have some dwarf ancestry.
He is carrying a hot poker though, better not mess with him.
mob6625@sundhaven.description: The blacksmith stands in the glare of the fire.
